about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Thirty years of dialogue with nature
about.story_text: In 1990, Fausto Favilli's journey into the plant world began almost in silence, driven by family necessity. But what was born as a duty turned, day after day, into a revelation. Enamored by the purity of plants and their resilient ability to exist, simply, Fausto found a deep sense of belonging in the earth.
about.philosophy_text: We don't just design spaces, we establish connections. Our goal is to accompany nature in its return to simplicity, so that those who live in the garden can perceive themselves as part of the surrounding horizon, with the emotional fantasy of the soul.
about.milestone_1990: The beginning of a thirty-year passion

aboutPage.hero_title: The Art of Listening to the Earth
aboutPage.hero_subtitle: The story of Fausto Favilli and the vision of SUBGarden
aboutPage.roots_text: In 1990 I wasn't looking for a career, but for answers. What started as support for the family business quickly became an intimate dialogue with the plant world. I was won over by the ability of plants to 'simply exist', their silent but invincible resilience. Since then, every garden we care for is a tribute to this strength.
aboutPage.philosophy_expanded_title: Borrowed Scenery and the Empathetic Garden
aboutPage.philosophy_expanded_text1: A garden doesn't end where the property line stops. Our technique is inspired by the concept of 'Borrowed Scenery': freeing the gaze rather than delimiting it. We use natural wings and perspective telescopes to merge the private garden with the infinite horizon of Tuscany.
aboutPage.philosophy_expanded_text2: We define our approach as 'Empathetic Garden' because it resonates with the inhabitants and the place itself. We don't impose a form, but follow the voice of the earth, using the most advanced technology to serve the greatest simplicity.
aboutPage.case_history_title: Restoration of the Soul: 18th Century Villa
aboutPage.case_history_text: One of our most significant projects was the recovery of the park of a villa from the 1700s in semi-abbandonment. We listened to what the park wanted to become again, restoring historical symmetries and secular essences, transforming it into an excellent setting for VIP events and absolute relaxation, without ever breaking the dialogue with the surrounding landscape.
aboutPage.innovation_text: Our story of love for nature led us to create SUBGarden: a patented non-invasive sub-irrigation system. We protect the value of historical and modern gardens with a technology that is not seen, does not destroy the existing lawn during installation, and guarantees eternal beauty, supported by digital precision and absolute respect for the water resource.

painPoints.title: Why Choose Sub-Irrigation?
painPoints.description: Traditional sprinkler systems are outdated. Discover the efficiency of the patented SUBGarden system.

water.title: Water and Energy Savings
water.description: Save 50% to 70% on water and energy thanks to targeted distribution to the roots.

mosquitoes.title: Zero Mosquitoes
mosquitoes.description: Reduce mosquito treatments by 90% by keeping the lawn surface dry at all times.

furniture.title: Furniture Always Protected
furniture.description: Leave your armchairs, sunbeds, and cushions on the lawn. No more moving them to water.

noise.title: Total Silence
noise.description: Eliminate the annoying night noise of sprinklers. Irrigation is underground and silent.

puddles.title: No More Puddles
puddles.description: Eliminate water stagnation on paths and lawn depressions. Walk on the lawn immediately after watering.

installation.title: Non-Invasive Installation
installation.description: Our patented system allows installation in existing gardens without destroying them. Fast, clean, and invisible.

process.title: Our Operational Method
process.step1_desc: Accurate analysis of the garden's status and any existing system to identify the best conversion opportunities.
process.step2_desc: Development of a precision grid pattern and detailed cost analysis, optimizing every supply line.
process.step3_desc: Presentation of the technical project, clear quote, and definition of the works schedule.
process.step4_desc: Fast, clean, and absolutely non-invasive execution. The lawn and roots suffer no damage, the system is invisible from day one.
process.step5_desc: Certified handover with one year of free support and possibility of unlimited warranty through seasonal maintenance.
